input.sentences: moss grows on a tree limb in the park .
not just the tree limb it also grows on the trees themselves .
the roots of this tree have obviously sustained a lot of rain .
when it rains the river rises and floods the area around it .
park benches sit on the side of the river so you can enjoy the scenery .
output.sentences: The tree branch was growing almost completely hortizonal.
The trees were growing slightly slanted with their roots submerged in a stream.
The roots were growing above the ground where their was no water.
Near by their was watering hitting against the large river rocks.
There is a wonderful seating area to sit on wooden benches and observe the wonders of nature.
